title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Bai Bian Lian Meng
synopsis: Will G.G. Bond be able to save Fairy World when his enemy is his father? Or is it a trick? G.G. Bond waivers between his alliance with his fellow warriors and his alliance with his long lost family.
